abilities.name: Magnetic Blast
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile in a straight line. All entities that come in contact with its effect area will be attached to it. Explodes after touching a wall with its effect area, damaging all attached entities.

abilities.name: 360 No-Scope
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile.

abilities.name: Star Storm
abilities.description: Deal damage to all players, including yourself (does not trigger escape).

abilities.name: Draconic Wings
abilities.description: Fly to the target and slash it. Use a basic attack after 3 seconds. Ignore all damage while preforming this ability.

abilities.name: Pyromaster
abilities.description: Summon 4 mines. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Arise
abilities.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and bring back 1 player from the dead with 1 HP.

abilities.name: Aura Pulse
abilities.description: Damage everything around you. If you have damaged at least 2 entities, recover 1 HP and 2 mana.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile. This damage can not be blocked.

abilities.name: Minedrop
abilities.description: Summon 1 mine. Use a different ability/basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Slingshot Strike
abilities.description: Drag your marble back from your intended attack direction (Range: 2) and then attack.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Move all entities away from your marble, but no further than max range from the epicenter (can collide entities into each other). Can be used instead of escape.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Entomb the target in a special barrier. Moving in the barrier or hitting it will destroy it and deal damage to the moving target and whatever is inside. Does not trigger if the entombed entity uses teleport or flying actions.

abilities.name: Bouncing Doom
abilities.description: Shoot a spreading projectile. If it hits an entity, it damages it and jumps to another target if in range (can’t hit same targets twice).

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Restore 1 HP to an entity. Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Shroom
abilities.description: Summon an indestructible node. Players that hit the node will be stopped in place, allowing them to reset the range of their current attack. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Explosive Shot
abilities.description: An attack that deals splash damage every time it hits a wall or an entity. Deals no contact damage.

abilities.name: Meteor Strike
abilities.description: Lift your marble in the air at your position and toss it at your target, creating an explosion at the first ground contact. Impact damage is doubled.
abilities.upgradeText: Ignore all damage while using this ability

abilities.name: Bomb Toss
abilities.description: Create an explosion at chosen location. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Thunder Blast
abilities.description: Fly to the target and drop your marble on it.

abilities.name: Leeching Strike
abilities.description: Attack a target. If you damage it, recover 1 HP to yourself.

abilities.name: Blind Shot
abilities.description: Attack an enemy with your eyes closed. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Barrier
abilities.description: Summon a barrier and use a basic attack. Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra action.

abilities.name: Mine Launcher
abilities.description: Pull up to 2 mines to your position and attack with them. If there are less than 2 mines nearby, you can summon mines for the attack at your position until you have 2 mines. Spend 1 mana for each mine summoned. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Blaze Wheel
abilities.description: An attack that deals splash damage around its trail. Take 1 damage if you land a physical hit on a spawn or a player while performing this attack.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description: Spin your marble at the target. This attack will damage entities until your marble stops.

abilities.name: Possession
abilities.description: Attack with another entity. This attack has the damage and effect of the entity. If the entity has no contact damage, the attack will deal 1 damage.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Switch places with another player. Use a basic attack or ability after cast.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.description: You are immune to all damage this turn, but your attacks can’t damage players. Attack a spawn (can verge). If you hit, repeat this action (until you miss or reach max mana). Recover 1 mana for each destroyed spawn.

abilities.name: Convert
abilities.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and restore 3 mana to yourself. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport forward. Use an ability/basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Wing Attack
abilities.description: Fly to the target and slash.

abilities.name: Multistrike
abilities.description: Attack a player/spawn. If you hit, let the target escape, return to your previous position and repeat the process (until you miss). These attacks can verge.

abilities.name: Clone Strike
abilities.description: Summon 2 clones of yourself and attack with them and your marble. These clones have 1 HP and die at the end of your turn. Your marble attack can verge.

abilities.name: Death Ray
abilities.description: Shoot a penetrating projectile (can damage multiple entities but can’t penetrate walls).

abilities.name: Sky Blast
abilities.description: On first turn, your marble flies up into the sky where it can’t be hit by attacks. On next turn, drop on the target, only dealing spash damage. Take 1 damage if you miss. Uses 2 turns in total.

abilities.name: Star Beam
abilities.description: Shoot a non-damaging projectile that spreads from entity to entity. When the projectile draws a closed loop, it detonates, damaging all players inside of the drawn polygon. Can't damage players that it spread from.

abilities.name: Ricoshette
abilities.description: A hopping projectile that resets its range after hitting any wall/barrier. Can hit multiple walls/barriers but can’t penetrate them. Must bounce at least once in order to deal damage.

abilities.name: Scorch
abilities.description: Slash a target, empty all their mana, and blind them until your next turn.

abilities.name: Quickshot
abilities.description: Use a basic attack and return to your starting position after your marble stops (can verge). You are immune to damage while using this ability.

abilities.name: Mana Storm
abilities.description: Turn all spawns into mana nodes. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Tectonic Wall
abilities.description: Create a barrier from one wall to another and summon 2 nodes on each side of the barrier. The barrier destroys only when both nodes get knocked out. Must be used close to a wall.

abilities.name: Quadraphase
abilities.description: Mult-step attack. 1: Attack (can verge). 2: Teleport to a R2 location. 3: Launch a R2 projectile after 3 seconds. 4: Teleport yourself or the first damaged target to your starting location.

abilities.name: Mana Transfer
abilities.description: Transfer up to your entire mana pool to another player. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Geomancer
abilities.description: Summon 4 mines around your marble. Next turn, if you haven't taken any damage from the previous turn, attack with all 4 mines and escape with your marble.

abilities.name: Hurricane
abilities.description: Spin your marble and collect all entities around it. After 10 seconds, drop all collected entities around your marble, damaging them. Damaged players empty all their mana.

abilities.name: Heartbreaker
abilities.description: Attack a player 3 times without changing your position or dealing damage, (can verge once). If you hit 3 times, damage the target, reduce their max mana by 1, and recover 1 HP.

abilities.name: Time Leap
abilities.description: Summon a point near your position. Consecutive uses will teleport you to the point. Use an ability/basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Master Strike
abilities.description: An attack that deals 1 additional damage for each time your marble bounces off a wall or a non player entity.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Damage everything in a 90º cone-shaped area originated from your marble. Area spread can't penetrate walls. Damaged players empty 1 mana.

abilities.name: Banana Time
abilities.description: Summon 2 HP nodes (min distance between nodes: 1). Escape after cast.

abilities.name: Toxin Cloud
abilities.description: Create an explosion (deals no damage). All affected players will take 1 more damage from the next damage source. All affected special mines and nodes are converted into regular mines.

abilities.name: Slam
abilities.description: Lift your marble in the air at your position and toss it at your target. Can only damage players that are in range.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Shoot a wide projectile. Attack with all affectedentities. These attacks have a 90° angle limit. Entities to the left of the projectile can attack in a left-forward facing cone. Opposite cone for right entities.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Attack a target. The target will take 1 extra soft damage on your next turn. Players that die from this ability won't trigger their on-death effects.

abilities.name: Berserk Strike
abilities.description: Attack an enemy. If you miss, take 1 damage.

abilities.name: Polar Shift
abilities.description: All entities are moved to the closest wall or barrier. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Summon a point and give yourself an extra action. When a second point is summoned, they get linked. Hiting the effect area of one teleport you to the other one, from which you can reset your attack range (also works for your projectiles, max 1 tp per turn). Only players with this card can use the portals.

abilities.name: Death's Touch
abilities.description: Attack a player. If you damage them, activate all their on-death effects.

abilities.name: Fairy Sawblade
abilities.description: Shoot a projectile that damages everything else in a wide line. If a player dies from this ability, it gains +1 damage.

abilities.name: Dark Wind
abilities.description: Blind all other players and double the damage that they receive until your next turn. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Rearrange
abilities.description: Move all movable non-player entities. Can escape after cast.

abilities.name: Aura Discharge
abilities.description: Charge up for 1 turn. On your next turn, damage all players around your marble. You can’t take damage while charging this ability. Can be used instead of escape. Use a basic attack after finishing this ability.

abilities.name: Enrich
abilities.description: Enrich ALL non-player entities in an area (mines, barriers, etc.), giving them +1 contact damage. Use a basic attack after cast.

abilities.name: Bounce Wall
abilities.description: Summon a special barrier and escape. When hit by a projectile, the barrier resets the projectile's range, allowing the caster to shoot it again from the impact point (can not penetrate the barrier). Consecutive uses will move the barrier (if in range) and give you an extra action.

abilities.name: Warp Mine
abilities.description: Summon a special mine and give yourself an extra action. Consecutive uses will switch your position with the mine, after which you can use an ability/basic attack.

abilities.name: Mana Blast
abilities.description: Use up all your mana and damage everything in a 90° cone. Give this ability +1 damage OR +1 range level for each mana that you spend.

abilities.name: Bullet Prism
abilities.description: Summon a point and use a basic attack. The point creates a copy of any projectile that hits it and resets its range. Area effects of these projectiles can't affect same target twice.

abilities.name: Polaroid Echo
abilities.description: Use the effect of your last used item. This does not count as item use. Mana cost is equal to your last used items' slot cost.

passives.name: Berserker
passives.description: Your abilities cost 3 less mana (min 0), but you gain -1 max mana after using an ability . When you reach 0 max mana, discard this card.

passives.name: Blademaster
passives.description: After landing 4 basic attacks on players, gain a shield that will block first external damage that you take (does not charge while you have the shield).

passives.name: Glory
passives.description: Gain +2 max mana when a player dies.
passives.upgradeText: Takes 1 slot less, +3 max mana on trigger

passives.name: Grove Heart
passives.description: On death, transfer your remaining mana to another player and heal 2 HP to them.
passives.upgradeText: Takes 1 slot less, heal 3 HP on death

passives.name: Explosive Shards
passives.description: Summon 10 mines on death.

passives.name: Pacifist
passives.description: Your basic attacks and abilities can’t damage allied players.

passives.name: Lucky Coin
passives.description: You can verge twice.

passives.name: Void Protection
passives.description: Gain 3 void shields, each expire after taking void damage. Regain all void shields when a player dies.

passives.name: Explosive End
passives.description: Explode on death at your position, dealing 1 damage. Adittional stacks increase S.Range by 1 level but don’t affect damage.

passives.name: Rainbow Gem
passives.description: Increases your max HP by 1 and max mana by 1.

passives.name: Mana Gem
passives.description: Increases your max mana by 2.

passives.name: Spellproof
passives.description: You can’t take lethal damage from enemy abilities (you will have 1 hp left). Can’t be combined with Durable and Spiked.

passives.name: Scrap Shells
passives.description: Summon a living mine for each point of damage that you take.

passives.name: Escape Master
passives.description: On escape actions, teleport to any location instead of moving regularly.

passives.name: Death's Decay
passives.description: Your on-death effects trigger twice. Discard this card after activating your on-death effects.

passives.name: Azure Cult
passives.description: Restore 1 mana to yourself after landing a basic attack on a player, but enemies don’t have to escape after your basic attacks (will still trigger mana recovery).

passives.name: Crimson Cult
passives.description: Recover 1 HP to yourself after landing a basic attack on a player. Your basic attacks deal no damage (will still trigger escape, turn skip, and mana recovery).

passives.name: Mana Cell
passives.description: Increases max mana by 4.

passives.name: Life Cell
passives.description: Increases max HP by 2.

passives.name: Loaded Up
passives.description: Start the game with 5 charged mana.

passives.name: Magic Shield
passives.description: Ignore first external damage that you take.

passives.name: Challenger
passives.description: You don’t need to escape after taking damage. This means that you won’t skip your turn. You still gain mana as if you were escaping.

passives.name: Life Gem
passives.description: Increases your max HP by 1.

passives.name: Final Accordio
passives.description: After your marble is destroyed, shoot a penetrating projectile in a straight line that can damage multiple entities (can’t penetrate walls).

passives.name: Elemental Resistance
passives.description: When damaged by a mine, ignore the damage and empty one mana. If you don’t have enough mana, the damage targets your HP.
passives.upgradeText: Also applies to void damage, takes 1 slot less

passives.name: Shadow Cult
passives.description: When a player takes void damage, summon 3 mines.

passives.name: Reinforced Shells
passives.description: Your mines can only take damage from player impact.

passives.name: Multispecialist
passives.description: Your abilities only take 1 slot and are upgraded, but you can only use each one once (max 10 abilities in deck). Start the game with 3 loaded mana.

passives.name: Durable
passives.description: Your marble can’t take lethal damage from basic attacks (you will have 1 HP left). Can’t stack with Spellproof.

passives.name: Eagle Eye
passives.description: Your basic attacks can verge on players.

passives.name: Spiked
passives.description: When a player hits you with a basic attack, deal 1 soft damage to them. Can’t stack with Spellproof.

passives.name: Phoenix Feather
passives.description: After your marble is destroyed, trigger all on-death effects, respawn anywhere with 1 hp and discard this card (turn skip still counts if the next turn is yours). Stacking increases respawn count.

passives.name: Protection Seal
passives.description: Recover 2 HP and discard this card when you reach full mana.

passives.name: Grand Exit
passives.description: On death, shoot piercing projectiles from all spawns towards your marble. This death effect will always trigger first.

passives.name: Scorching Aura
passives.description: Players near your marble are unable to use abilities.

passives.name: Morphosis
passives.description: You can skip a turn without acting or moving (will still give you mana). The following turns that you skip without being moved or damaged will regenerate 1 HP to you.

passives.name: Purification Cult
passives.description: Whenever a player is healed, you can destroy up to 4 spawns.

passives.name: Ichor
passives.description: After damaging a player with a basic attack, the next non-player damage that they take will be doubled. Debuff clears after triggering.

passives.name: Soul Imbune
passives.description: Decreaces your max HP by 1, but increaces your max mana by 2. Can't stack with Force Imbune.

passives.name: Force Imbune
passives.description: Decreaces your max mana by 3, but increaces your max HP by 1. Can't stack with Soul Imbune.

passives.name: Void Heart
passives.description: Your mines deal void damage (their damage no longer counts as non-player entity damage). You can’t take lethal void damage.

passives.name: Second Breath
passives.description: All your physical abilities can verge.

passives.name: Scavenger
passives.description: When a player dies, you get copies of their unused items and bring back all your used items (can overfill your item slots).

passives.name: Ethereal Guard
passives.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever a player takes void damage. On 3 charges, discharges and gains a shield that blocks first external damage (this shield can't stack).

passives.name: Call for The Stars
passives.description: Add 1 charge to this card whenever you summon a mine. On 7 charges, discharge and draw lines between all mines until they form a polygon. All players inside the polygon will take 1 void damage (won't trigger escape or mana gain).

passives.name: Star in a Jar
passives.description: Your marble can't be affected by status effects (blind, stun, ichor etc.), unless you use an ability/item that places a status effect on you during your turn.

passives.name: Cursed Soul
passives.description: When your marble lands a basic attack, blind the target for 1 turn.

passives.name: Cursed Body
passives.description: When your marble is hit by a basic attack, blind the attacker for 1 turn.

passives.name: Whisp Minion
passives.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever an item is used. On 1 charge, discharge and gain back one of your used 1-slot items. The amount of required charges increases with each living player.

passives.name: Sturdy
passives.description: You can’t take lethal damage from non-player entities.

passives.name: Crimson Pendant
passives.description: When a player is healed, gain back one of your used 1-slot items.

passives.name: Horcrux
passives.description: Summon a node at the start of the game (at any location). Damaging the node will deal the same damage to you and make both of you escape. While the node is on the field, your marble body ignores ALL other damage. Escape actions also move the node. This node can’t deal damage.

passives.name: Overenthusiasm
passives.description: Decreaces your max HP and mana by 1, but gives you 4 additional item slots.

passives.name: Backpack
passives.description: Increases your max number of item slots by 2.

passives.name: Valley of Monuments
passives.description: Your mines can’t take damage (can still be destroyed using entity-removing effects).

passives.name: Blood Pact
passives.description: Doubles your max HP but you take double damage from other player attacks (does not affect damage from non-player entities and void damage).

passives.name: Mana Capacitor
passives.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you cast an ability (on finish). On 2 charges, discharge and recover 1 mana.

passives.name: Infinite Prosperity
passives.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you summon an entity. On 5 charges, discharge and gain +1 max mana.

passives.name: Infinite Growth
passives.description: This card gains 1 charge whenever you summon an entity. On 8 charges, discharge and gain +1 max HP.

passives.name: Astral Body
passives.description: Set your max HP to 1 at start (can’t have any HP-decreasing passives). Ignore ability damage that you take from enemies, but empty mana equal to the damage that you would receive. If you don’t have enough mana, the damage targets your HP.

passives.name: Mana Blood
passives.description: Your missing HP acts as additional mana storage. When healing HP points that are occupied by mana, empty that mana and summon 1 living mine per emptied mana.

passives.name: Sniper Scope
passives.description: Extends the range of your projectile attacks by Range 1.

passives.name: World Splitter
passives.description: When moving using flying actions, draw a line from your take-off position to your landing. Entities that cross these lines take 1 void damage (new lines activate at the end of your turn). Destroy all your lines when you are healed or take void damage.

passives.name: Smartphone Grimoire
passives.description: Gives you 15 additional item slots, but your abilities are discarded after use. Not stackable with Multispecialist.

passives.name: Necromancer
passives.description: Your physical attack impacts turn spawns into living mines that you control. These turned spawns keep all their previous effects. Your physical attacks don't deal damage to spawns.

passives.name: Gambit Seeker
passives.description: Gives you 2 additional passive slots, but you start the game at 1 HP.

passives.name: Mana Barrier
passives.description: Instead of taking HP damage, reduce your max mana by the damage amount. Your abilities cost HP when you reach 0 max mana. Reduces your ability slots by 2.

items.name: Lasso
items.description: Drag the target towards your marble.

items.name: Adrenaline
items.description: If your basic attack hits this turn (on any entity), repeat it on a different target ONE more time from hit position. Can verge on entities.

items.name: Growth Script
items.description: Dispense all your mana in form of mines.

items.name: Nullification Script
items.description: Deal 1 damage to all non-player entities in range.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: Move in the direction of a wall/barrier that is in range.

items.name: Minewarp
items.description: If you hit a spawn this turn, you can teleport to another spawn and reset your attack range (ignore damage from this spawn). The used spawns will be destroyed. You can verge on spawns this turn.

items.name: Vampire Mine
items.description: Summon a special mine. Heal 1 HP when a player is damaged by this mine.

items.name: Ballistic Net
items.description: Stuns another player, making them unable to move during their next turn (they can still generate mana).

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: Recover 1 HP. Escape after cast.

items.name: Mana Potion
items.description: Recover 1 mana. You can’t use abilities this turn.

items.name: Forest's Heart
items.description: Regenerate 1 HP to all players in range.

items.name: Brew of The Dead
items.description: Sacrifice 1 HP and activate all your on-death effects. Can escape after cast. Can’t be used if you have 1 HP left.

items.name: Dragon Scale
items.description: Ignore first external damage instance until end of your turn.

items.name: Thunder Script
items.description: A projectile that can bounce from one non-wall entity once, resetting its range. Can escape after cast.

items.name: Tesseract Mine
items.description: Summon a special mine. When a player takes damage, they switch places with this mine at the end of the turn. If there is already an active tesseract mine on field, destroy it.

items.name: Chaos Script
items.description: All players empty one mana and spawn a mine near them.

items.name: Dust Wall
items.description: Summon a fragile barrier. This barrier breaks when damaged.

items.name: Betrayal
items.description: Choose to deal 1-5 damage to an allied player. If the ally dies, recover mana negatively proportionate to the damage dealt (5 damage = 1 mana, 3 damage = 3 mana, 1 damage = 5 mana).

items.name: Shift
items.description: Switch places with another player.

items.name: Upgrade Injection
items.description: Choose: 1: Upgrade all your cards and ignore all downgrades. 2: Deactivate all upgrades of a player and activate all their downgrades. Effects last until the affected player take damage from another player.

items.name: Impulse Script
items.description: Teleport an entity away from your position (can’t teleport into the void).

items.name: Cursed Touch
items.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard one of their abilities. Triggers once.

items.name: Smiting Touch
items.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard all their items and allow you to take one of them. Triggers once.

items.name: Freezing Touch
items.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will make them unable to gain mana. Effect lasts until they take next damage. Triggers once.

items.name: Decaying Touch
items.description: Damaging a player with contact damage this turn will cause them to discard one of their passives. Triggers once.

items.name: Disposition
items.description: Move a non-player entity. Can move barriers.

items.name: Detonate
items.description: Pick a mine. Destroy the mine and deal 1 damage to everything around it.

items.name: Force Field
items.description: Summon a special mine that will stop any player that moves into effect range (A.Range: 1) (will not work if the player is already in the affected area).

items.name: Black Hole Propulsion
items.description: Drop all on-field nodes and mines on your marble. These entities can move your marble. They deal/take no damage until the last one stops.

items.name: Mimic
items.description: Use an ability that belongs to another player (upgrades it and copies cost).

items.name: Duplicate
items.description: Summon a copy of any non-player entity that is in range. Can’t exceed summon limit of that entity.

items.name: Demonic Script
items.description: Recover 2 mana. The next ability that you use will cost health instead of mana. You need to have more available health than the ability cost.

items.name: Healing Block
items.description: Affected player is not able to recover health. Effect ends once that player deals damage.

items.name: Potency Spike
items.description: Enrich a mine, doubling its contact damage.

items.name: Blight
items.description: Blind a player until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Pocket Star
items.description: Remove all temporary negative effects from you (blind, ichor, venom etc.). Can be used in the middle of other abilities.

items.name: Pocket Clover
items.description: If you missed an attack this turn, redo it once. Effect wears out after triggering.

items.name: Pocket Mines
items.description: Summon 2 mines.

items.name: Impulse Jelly
items.description: Summon a special node (P.Range: 3). At the start of your next turn, all players are teleported towards that mine. Destroy the node afterwards.

items.name: Mana Injection
items.description: Instantly recover 1 mana.

items.name: Wyvern Carapace
items.description: Ignore the first external damage instance until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Neurotoxin
items.description: Your attack damage this turn will prevent targets from moving with escape actions until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Living Mine
items.description: Turn a mine into a living mine that you control.

upgrades.name: Tinkerer
upgrades.description: Your upgrade cards can upgrade twice as many cards, but reduces your max item slots by 3

upgrades.name: Overdrive
upgrades.description: Gives you 1 extra deck slot, but reduces your max HP by 2.

upgrades.name: Overgrowth
upgrades.description: Gives you 1 extra deck slot, but reduces your max mana by 3.
